title: A Customizable React Material Floating Button
author: trevorme91
content: readme.md react floating button menu material floating button menu implementation made styled-component & reactinspired react-material-floating-buttoninstallationnpm install react-floating-button-menu --savedemo the project pageusage can customize opening direction, speed, styles each button via props. options be added soonimport { floatingmenu, mainbutton, childbutton } 'react-floating-button-menu/build';import mdadd 'react-icons/lib/md/add';import mdclose 'react-icons/lib/md/close';... <floatingmenu slidespeed={500} direction="left" size={{ main: 56, child: 40 }}> <mainbutton iconresting={mdadd} iconactive={mdclose} iconcolor="white" backgroundcolor="black" /> <childbutton iconbutton={mdadd} iconcolor="black" order={1} backgroundcolor="white" /> <childbutton iconbutton={mdadd} iconcolor="black" order={2} backgroundcolor="white" /> </floatingmenu>...try demos locallygit clone https://github.com/ifndefdeadmau5/react-floating-button-menu.gitcd react-floating-button-menunpm installcd docsnpm installnpm startcontributingplease submit issues.
